Title: Justice
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Michael Brandt (teleplay by), Derek Haas (teleplay by), Matt Olmstead (teleplay by), Dick Wolf (story by), Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Mo Masi (story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Burgess goes to court for shooting a 17-year-old honor student she suspects shot Roman.
